purpose.p: Generic element attributes, which may be expressed on any XSLT or literal result elements.

body.usage: They are typically used on the xsl:stylesheet element.

property.name: default-collation
property.description: Used to apply styling to the element

property.name: exclude-result-prefixes
property.description: A space-separated list of namespace prefixes to exclude from the output

property.name: extension-element-prefixes
property.description: A space-separated list of namespace prefixes which identify extension elements

property.name: use-when
property.description: Whether or not this element and its children should be included in the stylesheet.

property.name: xpath_default_namespace
property.description: The namespace URI to be assumed for unprefixed names
